meanings.definition: The quality or state of being decorative.
meanings.sent1: Her room's decorativeness impressed all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The decorativeness of the painting added charm to the living room.
meanings.sent3: The cat's collar had a surprising decorativeness with tiny bells.
meanings.sent4: The decorativeness of the garden transformed it into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The decorativeness of the Christmas tree made it the focal point of the room.

meanings.definition: The ability to enhance the appearance of something through ornamentation.
meanings.sent1: The artist's decorativeness turned a plain vase into a work of art.
meanings.sent2: The decorativeness of the jewelry made it a perfect accessory for the outfit.
meanings.sent3: The cake's decorativeness was so elaborate that it looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a decorativeness that made even mundane stories sound fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The decorativeness of the curtains brightened up the entire room.
